title: They Came from the Shadows
text:
They Came from the Shadows is the fourth <a href="studio%20album">studio album</a> by the American <a href="punk%20rock">punk rock</a> band <a href="Teenage%20Bottlerocket">Teenage Bottlerocket</a>. It was released on September 15, 2009, on <a href="Fat%20Wreck%20Chords">Fat Wreck Chords</a>, their first release for the label. The album was recorded at <a href="Blasting%20Room">Blasting Room</a> in May through July 2009. Music videos were made for 'Skate or Die" and "Bigger than KISS."
The songs "Skate or Die" and "Bigger Than KISS" are available as a DLC for the <a href="Rock%20Band%20%28series%29">Rock Band</a> series via the <a href="Rock%20Band%20Network">Rock Band Network</a>. The former is exclusive to the Xbox 360, while the latter is also available on PlayStation 3.
